welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey [Russian]

step1.title: Discover Your Path [Russian]
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy [Russian]
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences. [Russian]
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level [Russian]
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals [Russian]

step2.title: Four Core Domains [Russian]
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy [Russian]
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly. [Russian]

step3.title: Start Your Journey [Russian]
step3.description: Begin with an assessment and unlock your potential [Russian]
step3.content: Ready to discover your AI literacy level and get personalized learning recommendations? [Russian]
step3.benefit1: Detailed assessment of your AI knowledge [Russian]

goals.title: What would you like to achieve? [Russian]
goals.subtitle: Select your learning goals to get personalized recommendations [Russian]

understand.title: Understand AI Fundamentals [Russian]

build.title: Build AI Solutions [Russian]

ethical.title: Ensure Ethical AI Use [Russian]
ethical.description: Understand and implement responsible AI practices [Russian]

goals.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one learning goal [Russian]
goals.helpText: Don't worry, you can always change these later in your profile settings. [Russian]
